workflow.setVariable("VAR_JOB_COUNTER", val);
logger.info("INFO: VAR_JOB_COUNTER : [" + val + "]");
logger.info("INFO: VAR_JOB_FLAG [" + xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_JOB_FLAG} + "]");
if (val > xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_10/pb_job_counter})
{

}" /></inputs>

inputs.val:
<inputs><script language="1" script="workflow.setVariable("VAR_JOB_FLAG","no");
logger.info("INFO: VAR_JOB_FLAG: [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_JOB_FLAG") + "] ");
 int val = 0;
 /* Do not set VAR_JOB_COUNTER before if conditions */
if (xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_JOB_COUNTER} >= xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_10/pb_job_counter})
{
 workflow.setVariable("VAR_JOB_COUNTER",val);
 logger.info("INFO: VAR_JOB_COUNTER: [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_JOB_COUNTER") + "] ");
 return false;
}
else
{
 workflow.setVariable("VAR_JOB_COUNTER",val);
 logger.info("INFO: VAR_JOB_COUNTER: [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_JOB_COUNTER") + "] ");
 return true;
} " /></inputs>
